p: We obtained divergence dates between epidemic HIVs and their closest simian relatives including recently discovered simian strains [1]– [2], through literature survey [6], [27]– [31] or by estimating new dates. We infer divergence dates using Bayesian relaxed clock analysis [40] for two separate data sets representing HIV-1 group M/SIVcpz and HIV-1 groupO/SIVgor/SIVcpz respectively.
